patterns.pattern: wrong number|sorry, I must have the wrong number
patterns.description: Common pig-butchering opener — 'wrong number' text on WhatsApp or SMS.
Transition from wrong-number opener to friendly chat — grooming phase.

patterns.pattern: i (work in|do) crypto trading|forex trading|liquidity mining
patterns.description: Scammer introduces themselves as a trading or crypto expert.
Claims to have a secret strategy or insider trading method.

patterns.pattern: i can help you (make|earn) \d+% (per day|per month) with no risk
patterns.description: Promises high, risk-free returns — no legitimate investment can guarantee this.
Directs victim to a fake trading app with a misspelled brand name.

patterns.pattern: you need to pay (a )?(tax|fee|service charge) before you can withdraw
patterns.description: Withdrawal-fee trap — the final stage of pig butchering before the scammer disappears.
